Chief's Message

The Troy Police Department will preserve, protect, and defend the Constitution and laws of Texas and the United States of America.  We will achieve this through fairness, respect, honesty, and vigilance.  The Troy Police Department strives to provide security and safety to all citizens and visitors of this great City of Troy, Texas.


Jeremy Gooch, Chief of Police
